attributes.action: Stop crackdowns on peaceful protests following lifting of Covid restrictions.
attributes.additional_details: This is a fundamental assault on democracy and has been a cornerstone for social change and progression for centuries in this country. This is a slippery slope towards authoritarianism which is not compatible with British values of democracy and liberty which we purport to support across the rest of the world.
attributes.background: Debate the proposal to continue legal restrictions on peaceful protests following the lifting of Covid restrictions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012
